text.ascii: vaizaMpAyana uvAca
text.ur: vaiśaṁpāyana uvāca

text.ascii: tamasAbhiplute loke rajasA caiva bhArata
text.ur: tamasābhiplute loke rajasā caiva bhārata

text.ascii: vyatiSThan vai muhUrtaM tu vyUDhAnIkAH prahAriNaH
text.ur: vyatiṣṭhan vai muhūrtaṁ tu vyūḍhānīkāḥ prahāriṇaḥ

text.ascii: tato 'ndhakAraM praNudann udatiSThata candramAH
text.ur: tato ’ndhakāraṁ praṇudann udatiṣṭhata candramāḥ

text.ascii: kurvANo vimalAM rAtriM nandayan kSatriyAn yudhi
text.ur: kurvāṇo vimalāṁ rātriṁ nandayan kṣatriyān yudhi

text.ascii: tataH prakAzam AsAdya punar yuddham avartata
text.ur: tataḥ prakāśam āsādya punar yuddham avartata

text.ascii: ghorarUpaM tatas te sma nAvekSanta parasparam
text.ur: ghorarūpaṁ tatas te sma nāvekṣanta parasparam

text.ascii: tataH suzarmA traigartaH saha bhrAtrA yavIyasA
text.ud: ततः सुशर्मा त्रैगर्तः सह भ्रात्रा यवीयसा
text.ur: tataḥ suśarmā traigartaḥ saha bhrātrā yavīyasā

text.ascii: abhyadravan matsyarAjaM rathavrAtena sarvazaH
text.ur: abhyadravan matsyarājaṁ rathavrātena sarvaśaḥ

text.ascii: tato rathAbhyAM praskandya bhrAtarau kSatriyarSabhau
text.ur: tato rathābhyāṁ praskandya bhrātarau kṣatriyarṣabhau

text.ascii: gadApANI susaMrabdhau samabhyadravatAM hayAn
text.ur: gadāpāṇī susaṁrabdhau samabhyadravatāṁ hayān

text.ascii: tathaiva teSAM tu balAni tAni; kruddhAny athAnyonyam abhidravanti
text.ud: तथैव तेषां तु बलानि तानि; क्रुद्धान्यथान्योन्यमभिद्रवन्ति
text.ur: tathaiva teṣāṁ tu balāni tāni; kruddhāny athānyonyam abhidravanti

text.ascii: gadAsikhaDgaiz ca parazvadhaiz ca; prAsaiz ca tIkSNAgrasupItadhAraiH
text.ur: gadāsikhaḍgaiś ca paraśvadhaiś ca; prāsaiś ca tīkṣṇāgrasupītadhāraiḥ

text.ascii: balaM tu matsyasya balena rAjA; sarvaM trigartAdhipatiH suzarmA
text.ud: बलं तु मत्स्यस्य बलेन राजा; सर्वं त्रिगर्ताधिपतिः सुशर्मा
text.ur: balaṁ tu matsyasya balena rājā; sarvaṁ trigartādhipatiḥ suśarmā

text.ascii: pramathya jitvA ca prasahya matsyaM; virATam ojasvinam abhyadhAvat
text.ud: प्रमथ्य जित्वा च प्रसह्य मत्स्यं; विराटमोजस्विनमभ्यधावत्
text.ur: pramathya jitvā ca prasahya matsyaṁ; virāṭam ojasvinam abhyadhāvat

text.ascii: tau nihatya pRthag dhuryAv ubhau ca pArSNisArathI
text.ur: tau nihatya pr̥thag dhuryāv ubhau ca pārṣṇisārathī

text.ascii: virathaM matsyarAjAnaM jIvagrAham agRhNatAm
text.ur: virathaṁ matsyarājānaṁ jīvagrāham agr̥hṇatām

text.ascii: tam unmathya suzarmA tu rudatIM vadhukAm iva
text.ur: tam unmathya suśarmā tu rudatīṁ vadhukām iva

text.ascii: syandanaM svaM samAropya prayayau zIghravAhanaH
text.ur: syandanaṁ svaṁ samāropya prayayau śīghravāhanaḥ

text.ascii: tasmin gRhIte virathe virATe balavattare
text.ur: tasmin gr̥hīte virathe virāṭe balavattare

text.ascii: prAdravanta bhayAn matsyAs trigartair arditA bhRzam
text.ur: prādravanta bhayān matsyās trigartair arditā bhr̥śam

text.ascii: teSu saMtrAsyamAneSu kuntIputro yudhiSThiraH
text.ur: teṣu saṁtrāsyamāneṣu kuntīputro yudhiṣṭhiraḥ

text.ascii: abhyabhASan mahAbAhuM bhImasenam ariMdamam
text.ur: abhyabhāṣan mahābāhuṁ bhīmasenam ariṁdamam

text.ascii: matsyarAjaH parAmRSTas trigartena suzarmaNA
text.ur: matsyarājaḥ parāmr̥ṣṭas trigartena suśarmaṇā

text.ascii: taM mokSaya mahAbAho na gacched dviSatAM vazam
text.ud: तं मोक्षय महाबाहो न गच्छेद्द्विषतां वशम्
text.ur: taṁ mokṣaya mahābāho na gacched dviṣatāṁ vaśam

text.ascii: uSitAH smaH sukhaM sarve sarvakAmaiH supUjitAH
text.ud: उषिताः स्मः सुखं सर्वे सर्वकामैः सुपूजिताः
text.ur: uṣitāḥ smaḥ sukhaṁ sarve sarvakāmaiḥ supūjitāḥ

text.ascii: bhImasena tvayA kAryA tasya vAsasya niSkRtiH
text.ud: भीमसेन त्वया कार्या तस्य वासस्य निष्कृतिः
text.ur: bhīmasena tvayā kāryā tasya vāsasya niṣkr̥tiḥ

text.ascii: bhImasena uvAca
text.ur: bhīmasena uvāca

text.ascii: aham enaM paritrAsye zAsanAt tava pArthiva
text.ur: aham enaṁ paritrāsye śāsanāt tava pārthiva

text.ascii: pazya me sumahat karma yudhyataH saha zatrubhiH
text.ud: पश्य मे सुमहत्कर्म युध्यतः सह शत्रुभिः
text.ur: paśya me sumahat karma yudhyataḥ saha śatrubhiḥ

text.ascii: svabAhubalam Azritya tiSTha tvaM bhrAtRbhiH saha
text.ur: svabāhubalam āśritya tiṣṭha tvaṁ bhrātr̥bhiḥ saha

text.ascii: ekAntam Azrito rAjan pazya me 'dya parAkramam
text.ur: ekāntam āśrito rājan paśya me ’dya parākramam

text.ascii: suskandho 'yaM mahAvRkSo gadArUpa iva sthitaH
text.ur: suskandho ’yaṁ mahāvr̥kṣo gadārūpa iva sthitaḥ

text.ascii: enam eva samArujya drAvayiSyAmi zAtravAn
text.ur: enam eva samārujya drāvayiṣyāmi śātravān

text.ascii: vaizaMpAyana uvAca
text.ur: vaiśaṁpāyana uvāca

text.ascii: taM mattam iva mAtaGgaM vIkSamANaM vanaspatim
text.ur: taṁ mattam iva mātaṅgaṁ vīkṣamāṇaṁ vanaspatim

text.ascii: abravId bhrAtaraM vIraM dharmarAjo yudhiSThiraH
text.ur: abravīd bhrātaraṁ vīraṁ dharmarājo yudhiṣṭhiraḥ

text.ascii: mA bhIma sAhasaM kArSIs tiSThatv eSa vanaspatiH
text.ur: mā bhīma sāhasaṁ kārṣīs tiṣṭhatv eṣa vanaspatiḥ

text.ascii: mA tvA vRkSeNa karmANi kurvANam atimAnuSam
text.ur: mā tvā vr̥kṣeṇa karmāṇi kurvāṇam atimānuṣam

text.ascii: janAH samavabudhyeran bhImo 'yam iti bhArata
text.ur: janāḥ samavabudhyeran bhīmo ’yam iti bhārata

text.ascii: anyad evAyudhaM kiM cit pratipadyasva mAnuSam
text.ur: anyad evāyudhaṁ kiṁ cit pratipadyasva mānuṣam

text.ascii: cApaM vA yadi vA zaktiM nistriMzaM vA parazvadham
text.ud: चापं वा यदि वा शक्तिं निस्त्रिंशं वा परश्वधम्
text.ur: cāpaṁ vā yadi vā śaktiṁ nistriṁśaṁ vā paraśvadham

text.ascii: yad eva mAnuSaM bhIma bhaved anyair alakSitam
text.ur: yad eva mānuṣaṁ bhīma bhaved anyair alakṣitam

text.ascii: tad evAyudham AdAya mokSayAzu mahIpatim
text.ur: tad evāyudham ādāya mokṣayāśu mahīpatim

text.ascii: yamau ca cakrarakSau te bhavitArau mahAbalau
text.ud: यमौ च चक्ररक्षौ ते भवितारौ महाबलौ
text.ur: yamau ca cakrarakṣau te bhavitārau mahābalau

text.ascii: vyUhataH samare tAta matsyarAjaM parIpsataH
text.ur: vyūhataḥ samare tāta matsyarājaṁ parīpsataḥ

text.ascii: tataH samastAs te sarve turagAn abhyacodayan
text.ur: tataḥ samastās te sarve turagān abhyacodayan

text.ascii: divyam astraM vikurvANAs trigartAn pratyamarSaNAH
text.ur: divyam astraṁ vikurvāṇās trigartān pratyamarṣaṇāḥ

text.ascii: tAn nivRttarathAn dRSTvA pANDavAn sA mahAcamUH
text.ur: tān nivr̥ttarathān dr̥ṣṭvā pāṇḍavān sā mahācamūḥ

text.ascii: vairATI paramakruddhA yuyudhe paramAdbhutam
text.ur: vairāṭī paramakruddhā yuyudhe paramādbhutam

text.ascii: sahasraM nyavadhIt tatra kuntIputro yudhiSThiraH
text.ur: sahasraṁ nyavadhīt tatra kuntīputro yudhiṣṭhiraḥ

text.ascii: bhImaH saptazatAn yodhAn paralokam adarzayat
text.ur: bhīmaḥ saptaśatān yodhān paralokam adarśayat

text.ascii: nakulaz cApi saptaiva zatAni prAhiNoc charaiH
text.ur: nakulaś cāpi saptaiva śatāni prāhiṇoc charaiḥ

text.ascii: zatAni trINi zUrANAM sahadevaH pratApavAn
text.ur: śatāni trīṇi śūrāṇāṁ sahadevaḥ pratāpavān

text.ascii: yudhiSThirasamAdiSTo nijaghne puruSarSabhaH
text.ur: yudhiṣṭhirasamādiṣṭo nijaghne puruṣarṣabhaḥ

text.ascii: bhittvA tAM mahatIM senAM trigartAnAM nararSabha
text.ud: भित्त्वा तां महतीं सेनां त्रिगर्तानां नरर्षभ
text.ur: bhittvā tāṁ mahatīṁ senāṁ trigartānāṁ nararṣabha

text.ascii: tato yudhiSThiro rAjA tvaramANo mahArathaH
text.ur: tato yudhiṣṭhiro rājā tvaramāṇo mahārathaḥ

text.ascii: abhidrutya suzarmANaM zarair abhyatudad bhRzam
text.ur: abhidrutya suśarmāṇaṁ śarair abhyatudad bhr̥śam

text.ascii: suzarmApi susaMkruddhas tvaramANo yudhiSThiram
text.ur: suśarmāpi susaṁkruddhas tvaramāṇo yudhiṣṭhiram

text.ascii: avidhyan navabhir bANaiz caturbhiz caturo hayAn
text.ur: avidhyan navabhir bāṇaiś caturbhiś caturo hayān

text.ascii: tato rAjann AzukArI kuntIputro vRkodaraH
text.ur: tato rājann āśukārī kuntīputro vr̥kodaraḥ

text.ascii: samAsAdya suzarmANam azvAn asya vyapothayat
text.ur: samāsādya suśarmāṇam aśvān asya vyapothayat

text.ascii: pRSThagopau ca tasyAtha hatvA paramasAyakaiH
text.ur: pr̥ṣṭhagopau ca tasyātha hatvā paramasāyakaiḥ

text.ascii: athAsya sArathiM kruddho rathopasthAd apAharat
text.ur: athāsya sārathiṁ kruddho rathopasthād apāharat

text.ascii: cakrarakSaz ca zUraz ca zoNAzvo nAma vizrutaH
text.ur: cakrarakṣaś ca śūraś ca śoṇāśvo nāma viśrutaḥ

text.ascii: sa bhayAd dvairathaM dRSTvA traigartaM prAjahat tadA
text.ur: sa bhayād dvairathaṁ dr̥ṣṭvā traigartaṁ prājahat tadā

text.ascii: tato virATaH praskandya rathAd atha suzarmaNaH
text.ur: tato virāṭaḥ praskandya rathād atha suśarmaṇaḥ

text.ascii: gadAm asya parAmRzya tam evAjaghnivAn balI
text.ur: gadām asya parāmr̥śya tam evājaghnivān balī

text.ascii: sa cacAra gadApANir vRddho 'pi taruNo yathA
text.ur: sa cacāra gadāpāṇir vr̥ddho ’pi taruṇo yathā

text.ascii: bhImas tu bhImasaMkAzo rathAt praskandya kuNDalI
text.ur: bhīmas tu bhīmasaṁkāśo rathāt praskandya kuṇḍalī

text.ascii: trigartarAjam Adatta siMhaH kSudramRgaM yathA
text.ur: trigartarājam ādatta siṁhaḥ kṣudramr̥gaṁ yathā

text.ascii: tasmin gRhIte virathe trigartAnAM mahArathe
text.ur: tasmin gr̥hīte virathe trigartānāṁ mahārathe

text.ascii: abhajyata balaM sarvaM traigartaM tadbhayAturam
text.ur: abhajyata balaṁ sarvaṁ traigartaṁ tadbhayāturam

text.ascii: nivartya gAs tataH sarvAH pANDuputrA mahAbalAH
text.ur: nivartya gās tataḥ sarvāḥ pāṇḍuputrā mahābalāḥ

text.ascii: avajitya suzarmANaM dhanaM cAdAya sarvazaH
text.ur: avajitya suśarmāṇaṁ dhanaṁ cādāya sarvaśaḥ

text.ascii: svabAhubalasaMpannA hrIniSedhA yatavratAH
text.ur: svabāhubalasaṁpannā hrīniṣedhā yatavratāḥ

text.ascii: saMgrAmaziraso madhye tAM rAtriM sukhino 'vasan
text.ur: saṁgrāmaśiraso madhye tāṁ rātriṁ sukhino ’vasan

text.ascii: tato virATaH kaunteyAn atimAnuSavikramAn
text.ur: tato virāṭaḥ kaunteyān atimānuṣavikramān

text.ascii: arcayAm Asa vittena mAnena ca mahArathAn
text.ur: arcayām āsa vittena mānena ca mahārathān

text.ascii: virATa uvAca
text.ur: virāṭa uvāca

text.ascii: yathaiva mama ratnAni yuSmAkaM tAni vai tathA
text.ud: यथैव मम रत्नानि युष्माकं तानि वै तथा
text.ur: yathaiva mama ratnāni yuṣmākaṁ tāni vai tathā

text.ascii: kAryaM kuruta taiH sarve yathAkAmaM yathAsukham
text.ud: कार्यं कुरुत तैः सर्वे यथाकामं यथासुखम्
text.ur: kāryaṁ kuruta taiḥ sarve yathākāmaṁ yathāsukham

text.ascii: dadAny alaMkRtAH kanyA vasUni vividhAni ca
text.ur: dadāny alaṁkr̥tāḥ kanyā vasūni vividhāni ca

text.ascii: manasaz cApy abhipretaM yad vaH zatrunibarhaNAH
text.ur: manasaś cāpy abhipretaṁ yad vaḥ śatrunibarhaṇāḥ

text.ascii: yuSmAkaM vikramAd adya mukto 'haM svastimAn iha
text.ur: yuṣmākaṁ vikramād adya mukto ’haṁ svastimān iha

text.ascii: tasmAd bhavanto matsyAnAm IzvarAH sarva eva hi
text.ur: tasmād bhavanto matsyānām īśvarāḥ sarva eva hi

text.ascii: vaizaMpAyana uvAca
text.ur: vaiśaṁpāyana uvāca

text.ascii: tathAbhivAdinaM matsyaM kauraveyAH pRthak pRthak
text.ur: tathābhivādinaṁ matsyaṁ kauraveyāḥ pr̥thak pr̥thak

text.ascii: UcuH prAJjalayaH sarve yudhiSThirapurogamAH
text.ur: ūcuḥ prāñjalayaḥ sarve yudhiṣṭhirapurogamāḥ

text.ascii: pratinandAma te vAkyaM sarvaM caiva vizAM pate
text.ud: प्रतिनन्दाम ते वाक्यं सर्वं चैव विशां पते
text.ur: pratinandāma te vākyaṁ sarvaṁ caiva viśāṁ pate

text.ascii: etenaiva pratItAH smo yat tvaM mukto 'dya zatrubhiH
text.ud: एतेनैव प्रतीताः स्मो यत्त्वं मुक्तोऽद्य शत्रुभिः
text.ur: etenaiva pratītāḥ smo yat tvaṁ mukto ’dya śatrubhiḥ

text.ascii: athAbravIt prItamanA matsyarAjo yudhiSThiram
text.ur: athābravīt prītamanā matsyarājo yudhiṣṭhiram

text.ascii: punar eva mahAbAhur virATo rAjasattamaH
text.ur: punar eva mahābāhur virāṭo rājasattamaḥ

text.ascii: ehi tvAm abhiSekSyAmi matsyarAjo 'stu no bhavAn
text.ur: ehi tvām abhiṣekṣyāmi matsyarājo ’stu no bhavān

text.ascii: manasaz cApy abhipretaM yat te zatrunibarhaNa
text.ur: manasaś cāpy abhipretaṁ yat te śatrunibarhaṇa

text.ascii: tat te 'haM saMpradAsyAmi sarvam arhati no bhavAn
text.ur: tat te ’haṁ saṁpradāsyāmi sarvam arhati no bhavān

text.ascii: ratnAni gAH suvarNaM ca maNimuktam athApi vA
text.ud: रत्नानि गाः सुवर्णं च मणिमुक्तमथापि वा
text.ur: ratnāni gāḥ suvarṇaṁ ca maṇimuktam athāpi vā

text.ascii: vaiyAghrapadya viprendra sarvathaiva namo 'stu te
text.ur: vaiyāghrapadya viprendra sarvathaiva namo ’stu te

text.ascii: tvatkRte hy adya pazyAmi rAjyam AtmAnam eva ca
text.ur: tvatkr̥te hy adya paśyāmi rājyam ātmānam eva ca

text.ascii: yataz ca jAtaH saMrambhaH sa ca zatrur vazaM gataH
text.ud: यतश्च जातः संरम्भः स च शत्रुर्वशं गतः
text.ur: yataś ca jātaḥ saṁrambhaḥ sa ca śatrur vaśaṁ gataḥ

text.ascii: tato yudhiSThiro matsyaM punar evAbhyabhASata
text.ur: tato yudhiṣṭhiro matsyaṁ punar evābhyabhāṣata

text.ascii: pratinandAmi te vAkyaM manojJaM matsya bhASase
text.ud: प्रतिनन्दामि ते वाक्यं मनोज्ञं मत्स्य भाषसे
text.ur: pratinandāmi te vākyaṁ manojñaṁ matsya bhāṣase

text.ascii: AnRzaMsyaparo nityaM susukhaH satataM bhava
text.ur: ānr̥śaṁsyaparo nityaṁ susukhaḥ satataṁ bhava

text.ascii: gacchantu dUtAs tvaritaM nagaraM tava pArthiva
text.ur: gacchantu dūtās tvaritaṁ nagaraṁ tava pārthiva

text.ascii: suhRdAM priyam AkhyAtuM ghoSayantu ca te jayam
text.ud: सुहृदां प्रियमाख्यातुं घोषयन्तु च ते जयम्
text.ur: suhr̥dāṁ priyam ākhyātuṁ ghoṣayantu ca te jayam

text.ascii: tatas tadvacanAn matsyo dUtAn rAjA samAdizat
text.ur: tatas tadvacanān matsyo dūtān rājā samādiśat

text.ascii: AcakSadhvaM puraM gatvA saMgrAme vijayaM mama
text.ud: आचक्षध्वं पुरं गत्वा संग्रामे विजयं मम
text.ur: ācakṣadhvaṁ puraṁ gatvā saṁgrāme vijayaṁ mama

text.ascii: kumArAH samalaMkRtya paryAgacchantu me purAt
text.ur: kumārāḥ samalaṁkr̥tya paryāgacchantu me purāt

text.ascii: vAditrANi ca sarvANi gaNikAz ca svalaMkRtAH
text.ur: vāditrāṇi ca sarvāṇi gaṇikāś ca svalaṁkr̥tāḥ

text.ascii: te gatvA kevalAM rAtrim atha sUryodayaM prati
text.ud: ते गत्वा केवलां रात्रिमथ सूर्योदयं प्रति
text.ur: te gatvā kevalāṁ rātrim atha sūryodayaṁ prati

text.ascii: virATasya purAbhyAze dUtA jayam aghoSayan
text.ur: virāṭasya purābhyāśe dūtā jayam aghoṣayan
